data.lyric:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.48]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:10.44]At the Christmas party hop
[00:13.07]
[00:14.19]Mistletoe hung where you can see
[00:17.00]Every couple tries to stop
[00:19.32]
[00:20.69]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:23.56]Let the Christmas spirit ring
[00:25.94]
[00:27.32]Later we'll have some pumpkin pie
[00:30.69]And we'll do some caroling
[00:32.75]
[00:34.13]You will get a sentimental
[00:37.13]Feeling when you hear
[00:39.75]
[00:41.12]Voices singing let's be jolly
[00:43.94]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[00:47.75]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[00:50.75]Have a happy holiday
[00:53.25]
[00:54.56]Everyone's dancing merrily
[00:57.31]In the new old-fashioned way
[00:59.94]
[01:28.44]You will get a sentimental
[01:30.87]
[01:31.45]Feeling when you hear
[01:34.01]
[01:34.95]Voices singing let's be jolly
[01:38.26]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[01:41.88]Rocking around the Christmas tree
[01:44.76]Have a happy holiday
[01:47.64]
[01:48.51]Everyone's dancing merrily
[01:51.70]In the new old-fashioned way
data.trans:
[ti:Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Brenda Lee]
[al:NOW That's What I Call Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:07.48]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:10.44]在圣诞晚会上跳舞
[00:13.07]
[00:14.19]槲寄生挂在那里你可以看到
[00:17.00]每对夫妇都试图停下
[00:19.32]
[00:20.69]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:23.56]让圣诞精神回响
[00:25.94]
[00:27.32]稍后我们会有一些南瓜饼
[00:30.69]我们会唱一些圣诞颂歌
[00:32.75]
[00:34.13]你会变得很伤感
[00:37.13]当你听到那些颂歌
[00:39.75]
[00:41.12]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[00:43.94]冬青枝铺满地板
[00:47.75]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[00:50.75]有一个快乐的假期
[00:53.25]
[00:54.56]每个人愉快地跳舞
[00:57.31]跳着传统的舞蹈
[00:59.94]
[01:28.44]你会变得很伤感
[01:30.87]
[01:31.45]当你听到那些颂歌
[01:34.01]
[01:34.95]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[01:38.26]冬青枝铺满地板
[01:41.88]绕着圣诞树摇摆
[01:44.76]有一个快乐的假期
[01:47.64]
[01:48.51]每个人愉快地跳舞
[01:51.70]跳着传统的舞蹈
